summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackIntroducing Curlsmith's revolutionary bi-phase Curl Refreshing Mist, an innovative solution crafted specifically for curly hair. Ideal to extend the result of a wash day.
details: DetailsBenefitsA curl refreshing mist to refresh, moisturize and define. Designed to refresh curls in between wash days.Up to 41% increase in hydration*Delivers long-lasting frizz control - for up to 24 hours*Reduces frizz by up to 71%*Contains 7 types of Hyaluronic Acids. Known to help maintain balanced hydration & enhance smoothness*Based on third party testing vs controlFeaturesWHO IS IT FOR? All curl types & textures.BEST FOR: Best for wavy and curly hair.FORMAT: Light mistRECOMMENDED FREQUENCY: Regular useColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643516How To UseShake well. Spray and mist sparingly through dry hair to reactivate curls. Ensure all strands are evenly coated and redefine your curls. Leave to air dry.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, C13-15 Alkane, Squalane, Glycerin, Xylitylglucoside, Octyldodecanol, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Carapa Guaianensis Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Seed Extract, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Pelvetia Canaliculata Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil , Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Anhydroxylitol, Maltitol, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Heptyl Glucoside, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lactic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride, Xylitol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Linalool, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Pinene, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes.
how_to_use: Shake well. Spray and mist sparingly through dry hair to reactivate curls. Ensure all strands are evenly coated and redefine your curls. Leave to air dry.
